Get Started

Get in Touch

Insurers

Partner with MiKare Health to reduce redundant care costs by empowering your members with a unified, portable health history that ensures every medical decision is informed. Please contact us.

hello@mikare.health

Clinicians

Partner with us to streamline consultations using tools that instantly convert complex patient narratives into clear, structured information. Please contact us.

hello@mikare.health

Patients and Families

We are here to help with questions and support, and to help you unify your health story so you can walk into every appointment with confidence, clarity, and proof.

support@mikare.health

Businesses

Your team are vital to your success. Give your team the wellness tools to keep them ahead of the curve and fully focused.

hello@mikare.health

Connect with us

Prepared participation

Better conversations begin with better preparation. MiKare helps people arrive informed, organized, and ready to engage - not opposing clinicians, but contributing to clearer clinical dialogue.

MiKare Health

MiKare Health is the smart, family-friendly app that helps you track symptoms, detect patterns, and understand your health with clarity and confidence.
